A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A couple of decent scenes\, a cool salt planet setting and a nice twist aren't enough to save this massive disappointment. Corny dialogue throughout\, over-the-top expressions\, the tired Star Wars formula thinly veiled as something fresh\, and a cringy scene where the Princess [and maybe the franchise] jumps the shark - all add up to an experience that wasn't worth waiting for\, much less paying for.
